alert_newNotification.message: You have received a new notification:

alert_newNotificationImportant.message: You have received an important notification:

alert_raidsCanceled.message: Transition to the channel was canceled

alert_raidsDescr.message: You took part in the Raid on the channel:

balloon_resetAll.message: You are going to reset all the extension settings, history and stats.

balloon_resetStats.message: You are going to reset all the extension history and statistics.

donate_info.message: Since this extension is free and I do not collect or sell your personal data, you are welcomed to make a donation to motivate hard work. Thank you!

extension_descr.message: Extension automatically claims Drops, Channel Points and Moments on Twitch, and also adds many other features!

extension_name.message: Automatic Twitch: Drops, Moments and Points

extension_translateHint.message: Translate the page into your language (by Google translate)

hint_autoReload.message: Experimental feature, may not work correctly in some cases. It is recommended to turn it off when the Internet is unstable.

hint_autoStart.message: To achieve this the extension will focus the respective tabs for a fraction of a second when they are loaded, you may see flickering at this moment.

hint_cancelRaid.message: The Raid page will load for a short time and will be returned back, with that you will receive bonus Points for participation in the raid.

hint_changeIcon.message: The red icon will only signal an active stream, it will not change for the tabs with playing videos, hosted and raided channel streams.

hint_integrityReload.message: Twitch may experience errors or may suddenly block certain user actions. When the extension detects such a problem, it will reload the page to try and fix it.

hint_notificationAlert.message: Alerts for important notifications will always be shown.

hint_preventPause.message: To prevent the browser from pausing the video player, the extension will unmute it for a second. Experimental feature, may not work properly in some cases.

intro_additional.message: Don't forget to check out the "Donate" section. You can read more about the nuances of the extension on the Help page.

intro_automates.message: The extension can automatically focus your browser (minimizing other programs), activate tabs, reload pages, temporarily unmute player and show notifications. You can disable this in the "Extension Settings" section.

intro_background.message: The extension performs its actions in the background without relying on the interface, so you can still see notifications about new Drops, Moments or buttons for earning Points. There is no point in clicking on them!

intro_basics.message: This extension will automatically claim your Drops, Channel Points and Moments. Just watch your favorite streams, no need to set up anything!

intro_events.message: The extension provides customizable alerts for certain events such as Raids and Predictions. It also keeps a history of recent events.

intro_hello.message: Hello and thanks for the installation ðŸ‘‹

intro_sets.message: The extension also provides a large set of additional features and settings, such as automatic player restart on errors, stream thumbnail displaying when hovering over channels in the menu, flexible settings for all types of alerts, and much more.

intro_stats.message: You can always check claims history, as well as the total number of claimed Drops, Points and Moments. Please note that only what is claimed by the extension itself is included here, and not automatically given to you by Twitch (for example, Channel Points for participating in the Raid).

offer_rateText.message: and tell your friends about it!

setting_autoReload.message: Automatically reload player or channel page on playback errors

setting_autoStart.message: Automatically start playback in minimized or hidden tabs

setting_cancelRaid.message: Prevent going to the Raided channel

setting_changeIcon.message: Change icon for Twitch tabs that have live playback

setting_clickPause.message: Stop playback by holding the left mouse button on the player

setting_enableVisual.message: Enable popup alert on Twitch website

setting_hideExtensions.message: Hide Twitch extensions overlaid on video player

setting_integrityReload.message: Automatically reload pages if there are problems with claiming rewards

setting_notificationAlert.message: Show an OS native alert when a new notification is received

setting_preventDiscard.message: Prevent browser from auto discarding inactive Twitch tabs

setting_preventPause.message: Prevent video stream playback from being stopped in hidden tabs

setting_showPreviews.message: Show preview images when hovering over channels in the menu

setting_testPredictionsResult.message: Run test alert for a Prediction end

setting_testPredictionsStart.message: Run test alert for a Prediction start

setting_testRaids.message: Run test alert for a Raid

setting_testReloads.message: Run test alert for a reload

title_alertPredictionsResult.message: When a Prediction (with your participation) results
